full_text: Self-reliance sounds safe, but remember that our meals, phones, clothes and jabs are all the product of global supply chains https://t.co/QSc0n6MJ99

localize.full_text: 自力更生听起来很安全，但请记住，我们的饭菜、手机、衣服、刺都是全球供应链的产物https://t.co/QSc0n6MJ99。
